title: Book Online at Northwood Chiropractic and Wellness
description: Northwood Chiropractic and Wellness - Enjoy an active life, pain-free - your chiropractor in Maple Grove, MN
cleaned_text: Book an Appointment If your concerns are a result of an auto accident, personal injury or worker's compensation claim please call us at 763-432-3932 Welcome to our online booking site Chiropractic Care [Read More](1-description) Chiropractic care is a holistic approach to health, focusing on spine alignment to alleviate pain, enhance mobility, and promote overall well-being. Through precise adjustments and personalized treatment plans, chiropractors address musculoskeletal issues while emphasizing preventive care and wellness. Additional recommended services may include therapeutic exercises, physical rehab, manual muscle work, and nutritional supplementation. This non-invasive, drug-free approach has gained recognition for its effectiveness in managing various types of pain and improving quality of life. Chiropractors often collaborate with other healthcare professionals to ensure comprehensive and patient-centered care. Whether seeking relief from pain or aiming to maintain a healthy lifestyle, chiropractic care offers a natural path to better health. [Back to Booking Page](/locations/northwood-chiropractic-wellness/book) Select a appointment from the list on the left to view available appointment times Located at: 10900 89th Ave N, Suite 1,
